oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Milking Your Birds
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rundel, Richard S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Milking birds is a term applied to amethod of increasing reproduction inbirds through the removal of eggs fromthe nest, which in turn stimulates additionaleggs being laid. Examples maycommonly be found among pheasantand waterfowl breeders due to the relativelysimple application of this technique.These birds are indeterminate layers,which means they will continue to layeggs until they have achieved a presetnumber of eggs in their nest. As long asthe eggs are removed, the bird normallylaying a clutch of 10 eggs, may lay as...
